document_data.caption: A map showing Undal's Lane and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Undal's Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Undal's Lane''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Undal's Lane was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. The road branched east off of the north side of [[Andamaar's Street]], connecting with [[Golden Serpent Street]] just north of [[Black Cat Way]]. An unnamed alley branched off the north side of Undal's Lane leading to the [[Magecourt]].
document_data.Notable Locations: [[Downybeard Tobacconist]] sat on the eastern side of Undal's Lane where it joined Golden Serpent Street.
